text: From a search results AI:  The only way to trigger a webhook notification based on a form submission would be to create a workflow with enrollment criteria based on the form's submission, and include a webhook action (Marketing Enterprise only).

Hello everyone! I'm planning to implement a workflow to delete a custom object (Property) from our website after a certain amount of time. Based on the documentation, it seems that the only way to automate this deletion is via an API call. The "Custom Code" option appears to be the viable approach, but it requires an upgrade to "Operations Hub Professional."
Does anyone have any workarounds or suggestions for this situation?
Thanks!
Call webhook in workflow that does this API call via Zapier or Make
